attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hello,my name is Scott Mcgregor,i find myself now living on the out skirts of Basingstoke,where the kids have nothing to concern themselves with... apart from alcohol and boredom,i understand this fully having come from Scotland.which is another issue.While i live here and see the kids die of bordom,where did the duty of care go for our young? I am a carer,i have a duty of care.............so should you, people that say you want to do the best for us? Well,i don't see this in any of your big actions for taking charge of the country.your cutbacks our killing us all old and young,i'm in my 40's so for me no worries, what about my 12 year old neice? I want to see a change in attitude to looking after our young in rural areas.........

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
